pr_title: Adding SSL dual mode support for SSLOnly

timeline.bodyText:
Why this change is made for 0.10 branch?
Not seeing other branches..
timeline.author: hardik-k-shah

replies.bodyText:
Have done this for ES 6.x plugin branches, the numbering is with respect to DEFAULT_MASTER_WITHOUT_SECURITY_PLUGIN and DEFAULT_ONE_DATA_NODE_WITHOUT_SECURITY_PLUGIN defined in ClusterConfiguration.
These enums define a 3 node cluster with 1 node not having the security plugin.
in ES 6.x cluster the node numbering seems to be in a reverse order compared to ES 7.x cluster, which is why had to do this change for ES 6.x plugins
replies.author: sachetalva
